name: Kneeler Boot - Monolithic Bonded
description: A single-piece boot that slides over the pew kneeler leg and is secured with adhesive. Simple, rigid, and durable.

printSettings.upperBoot: Polymaker PLA Pro (Black) | 4 Wall Loops | 35% Gyroid Infill

assemblyGuide: Clean the kneeler leg end, removing any paint or debris.
Apply 2-3 drops of Loctite 406 inside the boot cavity.
Press the boot onto the leg until fully seated.
Let cure for 60 seconds before use.
